# Application Privacy Statement

This privacy statement ("Privacy Statement") applies to the treatment of
personally identifiable information submitted by, or otherwise obtained from,
you in connection with the associated application ("Application", "Website",
"We" or "Us").

We use technologies like cookies (small files stored by your browser), web
beacons, or unique device identifiers to anonymously identify your computer or
device so we can deliver a better experience.

Our systems also log information
like your browser, operating system and IP address.

We do not collect
personally identifiable information about you.

In other words, we do not
collect information such as your name, address, phone number or email address.

We do not knowingly contact or collect personal information from children
under 13.

If you believe we have inadvertently collected such information,
please contact us so we can promptly obtain parental consent or remove the
information.

In serving you, we may use or store your precise geographic location, if you
give us permission to do so.
